entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Muncho Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023
